prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
There are a lot of troubling things going on with these activists finding willing audiences in corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne.  Just as they are trying to censor this brilliant and refreshing documentary on Dr. Zucker, (I'd encourage you to look into this heroic professional who was black listed by these career, taxpayer bleeding, social justice warriors and militant activists), they did the same thing with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum.  They banned any parental feedback and deferred to the activist themselves to review it and approve it, despite the fact that it heavily promotes gender diasphora, and the fantasies of Ben Levin.

These totalitarians operate under the guise of gaining equality for a supposed marginalized group, but are willing to go scorched earth with your children to get what they want.  If you don't go along you're branded a homophobe or ignorant, but ask them for any scientific evidence and they'll trot out some junk science and personally attack you.
stories:
Many distressing events are occurring, involving activists who find receptive allies in politicians like Kathleen Wynne, who is allegedly corrupt. This applies to their attempts to suppress a thought-provoking and reinvigorating documentary on Dr. Zucker, who is a courageous professional that has been blacklisted by activists and social justice warriors. This situation is reminiscent of when similar attempts were made to censor parental input on the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum. The activists suppressed any feedback and allowed only themselves to review and approve it. This curriculum endorses the concept of gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

These individuals, who act like totalitarians and advocate for a marginalized group's equality, are prepared to cause irreparable damage to children in pursuit of their objectives. Those who refuse to comply are labeled as homophobic or ignorant. However, if you ask them for empirical evidence to support their claims, they resort to using dubious science and resorting to personal attacks instead.

Numerous troubling incidents are taking place, often involving activists who have supportive partners in politicians such as Kathleen Wynne, who is accused of being corrupt. This is seen in their efforts to silence a revealing documentary about Dr. Zucker, a dedicated professional who has been ostracized by activists and social justice advocates. This situation is similar to when similar attempts were made to silence parents' opinions on the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum. Activists silenced any opposing views and permitted only themselves to evaluate and approve it. This curriculum promotes the idea of gender dysphoria and the beliefs of Ben Levin.

These individuals, who behave as if they are authoritarians and advocate for the equality of a marginalized group, are willing to cause permanent harm to children in order to achieve their goals. Those who disagree are labeled as bigoted or uninformed. However, if you ask them for concrete evidence to support their claims, they resort to using questionable scientific research and launching personal attacks instead.

Many distressing events are occurring where activists, who have allied politicians like Kathleen Wynne (currently under suspicion for corruption), try to suppress a revealing documentary about the dedicated Dr. Zucker, who has been shunned by these activists and social justice advocates. This situation is reminiscent of when a similar attempt was made to muzzle parents' voices concerning the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum. Activists stifled any dissenting opinions and allowed only their own evaluation and approval of it. This curriculum endorses the concept of gender dysphoria and the views of Ben Levin.

These individuals, who display authoritarian tendencies and advocate for the rights of a marginalized group, are prepared to inflict lasting damage on children to realize their objectives. Those who oppose them are accused of being bigoted or unenlightened. Yet, when pressed for solid evidence to back their assertions, they offer dubious scientific research and resort to personal attacks.

This curriculum supports the idea of gender dysphoria and the views of Ben Levin.

Those who disagree with them are labeled as biased or unenlightened. However, when asked for concrete evidence to support their claims, they provide questionable scientific research and resort to personal attacks.
